preqs: HSC1101 and HSC1102, or BMA1901 and one of BMA1902 or BMA1912.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BMS2011, BMS2031, PHY2021, PHY2032}
(Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {HSC1101, HSC1102} or  (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BMA1902, BMA1912} and  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {BMA1901}))

description: Processes of disease will be presented in the form of case studies, in which an analysis of the disease process will lead to an understanding of the presentation, and opportunities for management, of that disease. The major areas of study are: Disease at the cellular level, Cardiovascular disease, Respiratory disease, Cerebrovascular disease, Neoplastic disease, Renal disease, Disorders of the digestive tract, Liver disease, Endocrine disease, Genetic disease, and Bone and joint disorders.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
